submission:
class Solution:
    def maxOperations(self, s: str) -> int:
        n = len(s)
        arr = []
        i = 0
        while i < n and s[i] == '0':
            i += 1
        while i < n:
            c1, c0 = 0, 0
            while i < n and s[i] == '1':
                c1 += 1
                i += 1
            while i < n and s[i] == '0':
                c0 = 1
                i += 1
            arr.append((c1, c0))
        if not arr:
            return 0
        ans = 0
        m = len(arr)
        l1, l0 = arr[0]
        for i in range(1, m):
            ans += l1 if l0 else 0
            r1, r0 = arr[i]
            l1 += r1
            l0 = r0
        ans += l1 if l0 else 0
        return ans
